title.en: To Expect (ii) - Taking for Granted & Demands (Dar por hecho y exigir)
title.es: To Expect (ii) - Taking for Granted & Demands (Dar por hecho y exigir)

description.en: Learn to use 'expect' for taking things for granted and expressing demands. EXPECT + TO + infinitive (same subject). EXPECT + object + TO + infinitive (different subjects/demands). Critical for Spanish speakers confusing with 'hope'.
description.es: Aprende a usar 'expect' para dar por hecho y expresar exigencias. EXPECT + TO + infinitivo (mismo sujeto). EXPECT + objeto + TO + infinitivo (sujetos diferentes/exigencias). Crítico para hispanohablantes que confunden con 'hope'.
